mapper.insert: insert into faculties(name, deans_id, universities_id) values(#{arg0.name}, #{arg1}, #{arg2})
mapper.update: update faculties set name = #{arg0.name} where id = #{arg0.id}
mapper.select: select f.id as faculty_id, f.name as faculty_name, c.id as chair_id, c.name as chair_name, t.first_name as teacher_first_name from faculties f left join faculty_chairs fc on f.id = fc.faculty_id left join chairs c on fc.chair_id=c.id left join teachers t on t.chairs_id = c.id
